title: Facebook Is Missing a Big Opportunity With Messaging, BTIG Analyst Says
text: BTIG analyst Rich Greenfield, Wired Magazine Editor-in-Chief Nick Thompson and Bloomberg's Sarah Frier discuss Facebook Inc.'s shift toward privacy and encryption. They speak with Bloomberg's Emily Chang on "Bloomberg Technology."

title: Facebook won't show content containing vaccine misinformation
text: CNBC's Julia Boorstin reports on Facebook's announcement that it will reject ads or content containing vaccine misinformation.

title: Zuckerberg has given us no reason to believe him
text: Mark Zuckerberg signalled a major shift at Facebook, but history shows he often fails to deliver on promises.

title: Why did Facebook lose an estimated 15 million users in the past two years?
text: The slump was most pronounced among kids and young adults, according to a new report.

title: Facebook has a 'privacy focused vision,' says Mark Zuckerberg
text: Dan Howley and Dan Roberts of Yahoo Finance discuss Facebook's new privacy policy.

title: Jim Cramer on Facebook
text: Jim Cramer & Katherine Ross on the floor of the NYSE.

title: Why this expert says Facebook needs to focus on Instagram
text: Business Insider's Henry Blodget and Foundation Capital General Partner Paul Holland join CNBC's "Squawk Alley' team to discuss Facebook's pivot to privacy after repeated scandals.

title: Facebook pivots to privacy after numerous scandals
text: CNBC's Julia Boorstin reports on Mark's Zuckerberg's announcement to pivot Facebook into a company focused on privacy. This comes as Facebook has been battling scandal after scandal related to data breaches and privacy issues.

title: Facebook's Zuckerberg Presents 'Privacy-Focused Vision'
text: Facebook, Inc. (FB) co-founder and CEO Mark Zuckerberg shared his "vision and principles" for a privacy-focused messaging and social networking platform in an open Facebook post Wednesday

title: Zuckerberg trying to reverse Facebook's negative public image with privacy push?
text: Walser Wealth Management President Rebecca Walser on Facebook's privacy push and the state of the markets.

title: Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg's privacy pledge raising more questions than answers?
text: BigEyedWish founder Ian Wishingrad on Facebook's new focus on privacy may impact the social media giant's business model.
